original_solution_mapping.L1: He wants to stay 1000*.2=<<1000*.2=200>>200 pounds under the max
original_solution_mapping.L2: So he wants to stay under 1000-200=<<1000-200=800>>800 pounds
original_solution_mapping.L3: That means he can put 800-250=<<800-250=550>>550 pounds on the bar

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5507.
    Returns: the amount of weight John can put on the bar.
    """
    # L1
    max_support_weight = 1000 # support 1000 pounds
    safety_margin_percent = 0.2 # stay 20% under that weight
    safety_margin_amount = max_support_weight * safety_margin_percent

    # L2
    safe_max_weight = max_support_weight - safety_margin_amount

    # L3
    johns_weight = 250 # weighs 250 pounds
    weight_on_bar = safe_max_weight - johns_weight

    # FA
    answer = weight_on_bar
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He wants to stay {max_support_weight}*{safety_margin_percent}=<<{max_support_weight}*{safety_margin_percent}={safety_margin_amount}>>{safety_margin_amount} pounds under the max
So he wants to stay under {max_support_weight}-{safety_margin_amount}=<<{max_support_weight}-{safety_margin_amount}={safe_max_weight}>>{safe_max_weight} pounds
That means he can put {safe_max_weight}-{johns_weight}=<<{safe_max_weight}-{johns_weight}={weight_on_bar}>>{weight_on_bar} pounds on the bar
